TextView.android:text: Unbeknownst to Johnny, Claude has been working behind his back this whole time, as he was hired by Zaibatsu boss Trey Welsh and the Loony boss Elmo. While working for the Zaibatsu, Claude blew up an armored Yakuza Miara transporting Zaibatsu kidnapped biologist Doctor Cubana before he gave any secret information on the Zaibatsu to Johnny's Yakuza gang, destroyed the Yakuza J-Lab and started a large-scale gang war between the Yakuza and the Zaibatsu under orders of Elmo.
